statements: DELETE FROM body_camera_footage WHERE incident_date = '2022-09-15' AND location = 'Central Park';
DELETE FROM body_camera_footage WHERE location = 'Police Station' AND incident_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM body_camera_footage WHERE resolution = '1080p' AND duration <= '00:30:00';
DELETE FROM officer_details WHERE department = 'Police' AND badge_number = '12345';
DELETE FROM body_camera_footage WHERE officer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
DELETE FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND officer_id = '765e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM actions WHERE action_type = 'Arrest' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM incidents WHERE location = 'Downtown' AND officer_id = 'cc2200b4-9c5b-4f05-9d24-ae57d60f590f';
